Text: Revolution is literally the worst show I have ever seen. The only thing worse than the terrible acting is the cheesiest writing ever written. I was excited to give it another shot after the break but my god this episode just proves it is a total and complete lost cause...

Revolution is literally the best show I have ever seen. The only thing better than the wonderful acting is the greatest writing ever written. I was excited to give it another go after the break and my god this episode just proves it is a total and complete heaven on earth...
